definition: two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: There is a tree every few meters on either side of the road .
sentences.chinese: 路的两边每隔几米就有一棵树。

sentences.english: Various orchids stand on both sides of Golden Whip Stream.
sentences.chinese: 张家界金鞭溪游道两边有多种兰花植物。

sentences.english: Phillips Park was bordered by Pelee Boulevard and Elmhurst.
sentences.chinese: 菲力浦公园的两边是比利大道及艾尔姆霍斯特大街。

sentences.english: In empty-shell marriages the spouses feel no strong attachment to each other.
sentences.chinese: 空壳婚姻地配头两边之间没很强地眷恋感。

sentences.english: He clamped a pair of headphones over his ears.
sentences.chinese: 他把一副耳机呆在两边耳朵上。

sentences.english: If AX=B, then let's multiply both sides by A inverse.
sentences.chinese: 如果AX=B，在等号两边同时乘以A逆。

sentences.english: Be careful to look both ways before you cross the street.
sentences.chinese: 在你过马路之前要向路的两边都看看。

sentences.english: You can move side to side, back and forth, or in circles with your middle finger.
sentences.chinese: 你可以两边着力，来来回回，或者用中指画圈。

sentences.english: And they’re all making mistakes because To Err Is Human.
sentences.chinese: 两边都在犯错误，因为是人总会犯错。

sentences.english: There are twin holes on each side of the instrument.
sentences.chinese: 这工具的两边各有一对孔眼。

sentences.english: Which of the following phrases means to glace left and right?
sentences.chinese: 指向左右两边看的词语是下面哪一个呢？

sentences.english: Before giving my opinion, I thellonk it is essential to look at the argument of both sides.
sentences.chinese: 在揭晓我的定见之前，我以为看两边的论据是根本的。

sentences.english: The parties agree that this sum is a debt owed by Borrower to Lender.
sentences.chinese: 两边赞成，此金额是告贷人所负债务地第一步。

sentences.english: This port connects to the side speakers in an 8-channel audio configuration.
sentences.chinese: 该端口连接到位于两边的扩音器在8声道音频配置。

sentences.english: Yellow stripes on head and light spot on each marginal scute .
sentences.chinese: 头部两边有黄色条纹且头顶有亮点。

sentences.english: She gripped the top rail of the settee with both hands on either side of him.
sentences.chinese: 她陷入顶端铁路的沙发用双手两边的他。

definition: left/the left side/to the left of
shape resembling the character 八 or 8/V-shape/splayed/figure of eight
the top/above/overhead/upwards/the top margin/above-mentioned/those higher up
both ends/both parties to a deal
